casebody.data:
HENRY FORD HEALTH SYSTEM, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
EVEREST NATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158904
COA: 341563 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 30, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion to hold the defendant's application for leave to appeal in abeyance for Shah v State Farm Mut Auto Ins Co (Docket No. 157951) is considered, and it is GRANTED. We ORDER that the application for leave to appeal the November 20, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals be held in ABEYANCE pending the decision in Shah .
